title: Winter Wonder Skins
body: I thought Winter Wonder Orianna looked cool and I wondered if Winter Wonder skins are available every Winter. Thank you.

replies.body: While the sales haven't yet been announced, there's a very good chance that Winter Wonder Orianna will be available for purchase this year (:
Thank you. If it doesn't I guess I'll have to wait until a mystery gift gets it for me. {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
